content.title: Social Networking!

January 23, 2015
content.content: Check us out on Facebook!  USGC HQ  This means "United Scorers Gaming Centers"!  Feel free to email us at USGCHQ@gmail.com!

content.title: Pod Design
content.creator:
Scott Wisecarver
January 15, 2015
content.content: Currently I am working on two different game pod designs.  One is an 8 man cube pod and the other is an individual game pod that resembles the drop pod from HALO: ODST...

comments.text: Dude this is going to be awesome! Keep it up! ï¿½
